title: Dragon Quest Heroes 2: Explorer’s Edition + All DLCs
body:
Dragon Quest Heroes 2: Explorer’s Edition + All DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Slasher, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Omega Force / Square Enix
Languages: ENG/MULTI
Original Size: 23.8 GB
Repack Size: from 8 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: 3 hosters (Uploaded by Susch, interchangeable, NOT compatible with MultiUpload mirrors) [Use JDownloader2]

CODEX Proper Crack (unpack over existing repack)

  • SendFile Mirror
  • Zippyshare Mirror
  • MultiUpload Mirror

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Steam release (as of June 2, 2017): 23.8 GB
  • BALDMAN crack V3 with ALI213 emu applied over. Alternative CODEX emu can be found in NoDVD folder after installation
  • All DLCs included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of lowres (720p) or highres (1080p) movies and Japanese voiceovers if you don’t need them
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 23.8 to 8~16.8 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 20-45 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 24 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings (CONFIG.exe in game root), voiceovers language can be changed while starting a new game
  • Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! The game uses Low (720p) or High-quality (1080p) movies automatically, based on your resolution. So if you want to play in 1080, but with low-qiality movies, after installation copy all files from “mdat\Low” to “mdat\High” folder. And make it vice versa, if you want to play with high-res movies in a lower resolution. Otherwise you’ll see DQ logo as a placeholder

Game Description

DRAGON QUEST HEROES II is a hack-and-slash, field-roaming Action RPG that sends players on a new adventure to restore order to a once peaceful world filled with hordes of monsters and battles of epic proportions. Up to 4 players can band together in cooperative multiplayer to conquer swarms of enemies and defeat challenging boss monsters. There is also a cast of many playable characters each with unique moves and abilities – including a host of familiar faces from the DRAGON QUEST® series and four brand new heroes that must team up to defeat an unknown threat looming over the Seven Realms!

Game Features

  • Transform into a monster and battle as one of them
  • New world, new story & new adventures
  • Numerous unique characters each with unique abilities
  • Change your vocation and play in any fighting style with a variety of magic & weapons!
